Detailed Description

Base class used to build floating window to supporting multi window. 

  class MyWindow : public gaia::core::MultiWindow {
    public:
      gaia::core::Button* mpBtn1;
      gaia::core::Button* mpBtn2;
      gaia::core::LinearLayout* mpController;
      virtual Widget* onWindowCreate(gaia::core::Context* ctx);
      virtual void onWindowDelete();
      . . .
  };
  //In your Window onWindowCreate to customized your layout.
  Widget* MyWindow::onWindowCreate(gaia::core::Context* ctx, gaia::core::Demand* demand) {
      mpController = new gaia::core::LinearLayout(ctx);
      if (mpController != NULL) {
          mpBtn1 = new gaia::core::Button(ctx);
          if (mpBtn1 != NULL) {
             mpController->addWidget(mpBtn1);
          } else {
             GLOGE("Button1 create failed!!!");
          }
          mpBtn2 = new gaia::core::Button(ctx);
          if (mpBtn2 != NULL) {
             mpController->addWidget(mpBtn2);
          } else {
             GLOGE("Button2 create failed!!!");
          }
     }
     return mpController;
  }

  //In your onWindowDelete to release component to avoid memory leak.
  void MyWindow::onWindowDelete() {
     if (mpBtn1 != NULL) {
         delete mpBtn1;
         mpBtn1 = NULL;
     }

     if (mpBtn2 != NULL) {
         delete mpBtn2;
         mpBtn2 = NULL;
     }

     if (mpController != NULL) {
         delete mpController;
         mpController = NULL;
     }
  }

void gaia::core::MultiWindow::closeWindow ( )

Method of close window.

void gaia::core::MultiWindow::hideWindowTitleBar ( bool  hide)

Method to control window title bar(Titlename + control button).

Control title hide/show. But when the title is hide, per touch event on the window will force the title show again to avoid security problem.

Parameters:
hidetrue for hide title and else versa.

virtual Widget* gaia::core::MultiWindow::onWindowCreate ( gaia::core::Context *  context,
gaia::core::Demand *  demand 
) [virtual]

The callback to notify the window is created.

When window created, it already created the Title bar (title/maximize/normalize/exit). And user could define itself's layout in this function and return the customized widget.

virtual void gaia::core::MultiWindow::onWindowDelete ( ) [virtual]

The callback to notify the window will be deleted.

void gaia::core::MultiWindow::setWindowTitle ( const base::String &  title)

Method to customize the floating window title.

Default title will use class name as default title. This function should call after onWindowCreate callback.

Parameters:
titleThe title would like to customize.
